results.title: Discoveries
results.brief_description: Chaos, jealousy, violence, anger and fear - childhood emotions experienced by Angela as she compares her life to the game of soccer. Angela is the soccer ball, her parents the two opposing teams - and no-one is the winner in this game of life, especially Angela. But she is playing her own game now and nothing will stop her - not even Brazil.
results.description: Chaos, jealousy, violence, anger and fear - childhood emotions experienced by Angela as she compares her life to the game of soccer. Angela is the soccer ball, her parents the two opposing teams - and no-one is the winner in this game of life, especially Angela. But she is playing her own game now and nothing will stop her - not even Brazil.
description_for_label: Chaos, jealousy, violence, anger and fear - childhood emotions experienced by Angela as she compares her life to the game of soccer. Angela is the soccer ball, her parents the two opposing teams - and no-one is the winner in this game of life, especially Angela. But she is playing her own game now and nothing will stop her - not even Brazil.

results.title: Gilmore girl
results.brief_description: Moving house is one thing but changing schools is a totally different story. Anda talks about her journey to find her place, of moving house from St Albans to Yarraville and eventually back to St Albans, of leaving the old and familiar behind and having to confront a new school, new friends and an unfamiliar environment.
results.description: Moving house is one thing but changing schools is a totally different story. Anda talks about her journey to find her place, of moving house from St Albans to Yarraville and eventually back to St Albans, of leaving the old and familiar behind and having to confront a new school, new friends and an unfamiliar environment.

results.title: Norbert
results.creator_credit: Michael Hill and Animation and Interactive Media (AIM) RMIT
results.brief_description:
Animated ‘fractured fairytale’ story about Norbert, with abnormally big ears, and the prejudices he faces from the local townsfolk. Being different, Norbert soon discovers, means a lonely and alienated life. A rather bleak piece laced with moments of off-beat black humour. Narrated by V J Shanmugam.
Graduate work from an AIM (Centre for Animation and Interactive Media) RMIT graduate, 2006.

results.title: An Inner passion
results.creator_credit: Hung Lin and Animation and Interactive Media (AIM) RMIT
results.brief_description:
Hand-drawn 2-D animated moral tale of a baker and his assistant and how one person’s passion can inspire and change the actions of their bullying and intolerant boss.
Original music score by James Hodson. No dialogue.
Graduate work from an AIM (Centre for Animation and Interactive Media) RMIT graduate, 2006.

results.title: Carnaval
results.creator_credit: Juan Serrano and Animation and Interactive Media (AIM) RMIT
results.brief_description:
A computer animated story of myth, magic and power and two alien beings spirited away to planet Earth. No dialogue. Original music score by SISMO.
Graduate work from an AIM (Centre for Animation and Interactive Media) RMIT graduate, 2006.

results.title: Tree of us
results.creator_credit: Vilakone Phachanthavong and Animation and Interactive Media (AIM) RMIT
results.brief_description:
Vilakone has created powerful graphics in this animated work about the family of the future through the use of a predominantly red background, with black and white hand-drawn images. No dialogue.
Graduate work from an AIM (Centre for Animation and Interactive Media) RMIT graduate, 2006.

results.title: Father's kite
results.creator_credit: John Shen and Animation and Interactive Media (AIM) RMIT
results.brief_description:
Poetic 2-D hand-drawn animated tale of a father/son relationship as they share the joys of flying a kite. Music composed and performed by John Shen. No dialogue.
Graduate work from an AIM (Centre for Animation and Interactive Media) RMIT graduate, 2006.

results.title: New love
results.creator_credit: Jayt Buchanan and Animation and Interactive Media (AIM) RMIT
results.brief_description:
A captivating piece of animation about the wonderment of new love - the hopes and dreams and the possibilities. Dialogue is replaced by the simple flowing of words as they weave in and out and around the lovers. Music score adapted from the track New Love by Cam Butler and Silver Ray.
Graduate work from an AIM (Centre for Animation and Interactive Media) RMIT graduate, 2006.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Jayt Buchanan and Animation and Interactive Media (AIM) RMIT
